title: REX 4 Sp1 + Hotfix
description:
REX 4 - Texture Direct



SP1:


FIX LIST

 

The following is a list of changes and fixes within Service Pack 1 (build: 4.1.2014.0122)
1.) Option and checkbox buttons not showing in Windows 7, basic or classic mode. - FIXED
2.) Weather Engine checkbox not saving after close down - FIXED
3.) Temperature font cutting off on weather theme window - FIXED
4.) Removed single quote error when naming a theme. - FIXED
5.) Menubars being cut off with screen resolutions less than 1152 x 864 - FIXED
 
SERVICE PACK 1 INSTALLATION PROCEDURE
 
FROM: REX 4 - TEXTURE DIRECT BUILD 4.0.2013.1214
TO:  REX 4 - TEXTURE DIRECT BUILD 4.1.2014.0122
 
 
THIS IS THE PROCEDURE ON HOW TO INSTALL REX 4 - TEXTURE DIRECT SERVICE PACK 1

I. INSTALLATION PROCESS
 
STEP 1 - Click on the setup.exe link provided.  This will automatically start the installation process.
STEP 2 - When the installation wizard asks you for the folder to install REX 4 - Texture Direct SP 1, click the Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ button and select the folder where you installed REX 4 Texture Direct (i.e - C:REX Texture Direct).
STEP 3 - After the installation process is over, click the "FINISH" to close out the installation.
 






HotFIX:



FIX LIST

The following is a list of changes and fixes within Service Pack 1 HOTFIX 1  (build: 4.1.2014.0128)

1.) Fixed issue with lower resolution screens causing application to jump - FIXED
 
SERVICE PACK 1 HOTFIX 1 INSTALLATION PROCEDURE
 
FROM: REX 4 - TEXTURE DIRECT BUILD 4.1.2014.0122
TO:  REX 4 - TEXTURE DIRECT BUILD 4.1.2014.0128
 
 
THIS IS THE PROCEDURE ON HOW TO INSTALL REX 4 - TEXTURE DIRECT SERVICE PACK 1 HOTFIX

I. INSTALLATION PROCESS
 
STEP 1 - Click on the setup.exe link provided.  This will automatically start the installation process.
STEP 2 - When the installation wizard asks you for the folder to install REX 4 - Texture Direct SP 1 Hotfix 1, click the Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ button and select the folder where you installed REX 4 Texture Direct SP 1 (i.e - C:REX Texture Direct).
STEP 3 - After the installation process is over, click the "FINISH" to close out the installation.
